info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:36PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Storey and southern Washoe Counties through 815 PM PDT... At 735 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over the north valleys and Reno, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reno, Sparks, Stead, Lockwood, Wingfield Springs, Northwest Reno, Lemmon Valley, Lemmon Valley-Golden Valley, Mogul, Golden Valley, Verdi-Mogul, Caughlin Ranch, Reno-Tahoe International Airport, Hidden Valley, Somersett, Spanish Springs, Cold Springs, Mustang, NWS Reno and Stead Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall and frequent cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
